name: R packages (via pak)
description: Installs R packages via the pak R package's function. R must be already installed.

packages.description: Comma separated list of packages to install to pass to the `pak::pak()` function.

pakVersion.description: Version of pak to install. By default, the devel version is installed if needed.

installSystemRequirements.description: Install packages' system requirements if available via `pak::pak()`.

notCran.description: The 'NOT_CRAN' environment variable that is referenced during the installation of this Feature.
